content.detailedDescription:
Disappeared in clouds one after one
maybe helicopters? but i have never seen here 3 helicopters together at the same time
observed from about 10-30 kilometers with my own eyes and cheap binoculars, 5 to 10 minutes
other person saw it too
probably over forest/lake not urban area
content.summary: 3 orange light, triangle formation

content.detailedDescription: Test report
content.summary: Test saw strange craft

content.detailedDescription: My highschool friend and i had been riding around we were heading home on lower paint creek rd.Going to clay city from stanton and i noticed there were cars in the ditches and parked on the curb this was very strange.Then i saw the lights over the lake.There was five orbs the one on the end left would race off to the west and return in the east only to go back into formation and after a few minutes it would race off again then vanish only to reapear in another location ,it looked like time travel.My friend said ,it's those big spot lights bouncing off the clouds! he was trying to find a explanation and i new he was freaked out because i was to.So we wrote if off as lights and went home,at school the next day my other classmates were telling me about a ufo crashing at the north fork rd near the red river george area.He said there was armed gaurds blocking off the rd. he also said that covered military semi trucks hauled out the wreckage .After hearing this very credible friends explanation of events then i realized that i couldnt lie to myself any longer i had to face the reality that what we saw was no spot lights.Now 20 plus years latter theres alot of people on t v who support my experience .That's just one incident there many more that i'm going to report,thanks mufon!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A friend and i observed five lights,another friend the next day witnessed crash and military removal

content.detailedDescription:
This report was summitted by sttephen cox, chief field investigator ny-mufon

good evening,
 
i would like to report multiple orange glowing objects on the evening of june 30, 2012 at approximately 9:35pm, which lasted for about 6 minutes.
 
i would just like to say that i have never reported anything like this, ever.
 
i live in queens, ny - about 4 miles south of la guardia airport. i recorded multiple orange glowing objects while walking my dog.
 
these objects came in from the south west (probably over brooklyn, ny) and flew in single, double and triple formations (silently) heading north east towards la guardia airport. strangely enough there were no aircraft landing or taking off during this sighting. i did manage to take a few short video clips from my cell phone. 

they were orange, no blinking lights (not planes ! i live by the airport and see planes landing and taking off constantly) they seemed kin of translucent, like they didn't have a solid core and they were the size of an baby asprin. they also seemed to be only a few thousand feet in altitude, i would guess 3 - 4 thousand feet high. there were also multiple witnesses.
 
thank you,
content.summary: Multiple orange glowing objects

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home at about 10pm.When i saw these spheres hovering over the neighborhood above the houses. i was amazed to see them and was takong pics at the first friday art walk so i pulled over and took these pics . i did not have the time to set the camera for night shots as i was in a hurry to get these. i was staring at three red-orange objects that seemed to pulsate with ther rich colors.One was more red than the others and shimmered with a buitiful color. i took a few pics and was hoping to set my camera for night pics when i noticed that the spheres were getting smaller and then realized that they were ascending straight up and were then gone. i was with a friend who was sitting in the passenger side and asked him what he thought as i was pointing them out to him and talking about them while shooting the pics. he told me he did not see them which i could not believe as they were rather very large and hovering above the houses and the distance was hard to guage. i was told by my friend that he blacked out and does not remember even though he does rememberbeing in yhe car with me but had seen them in the past when he was younger and had dreams about them in past. as soon as i saw the spheres iinstantly thought about the phoenix lights that were seen before. i was amazed as i had soken to my mom just a few weeks before and we both said to each other thatr we would like to see them ourselves. i was amazed at the site.
content.summary: Saw these spheres over my neighborhood and took pics with my cannon powershot

content.detailedDescription: I was laying in bed when i hear a strange sound and my dad and my brother who are on the studio shout to me that something is passing by at fast speed. so i opened the window and saw a missile like aircraft that looked small , passing at very fast speed above our building. it was dark or grey, but it was midnight so it was very difficult to see it on details. i was shocked and surprised by this object and its speed captivated me, its sound was like a bomb being dropped or a missile launched. i felt like something was spying  on us or doing recon on the area, i didn't feel fear since my dad said it could be a us government drone. the object went fast from the sky in straight direction to the mall near my house, at a low speed, we thought it could collide then disappeared mid-air.
content.summary: A black missile-like aircraft, passed above my building and the one next to it. fast and sounded like a missile being deployed then disappeared into the sky at a fast speed.

content.detailedDescription: I was going fishing at the fishing pier in cape henlopen state park on the night of june 28th at a little after 10 pm edt. also present were my father, brother, and 2 nephews as well as many other people who were on the pier that night. as we started to walk out the pier a triangular shaped object appeared from the western sky. it seemed to be solid black with lights at each corner. the lights seemed to have a red-orange flicker to them. the object silently and very slowly went over the bay, the pier and ultimately over the atlantic ocean. it seemed to rotate as it passed overhead very slowly. it was very low in the sky seeming to be no more than 200 feet overhead. it was moving with the wind and climbing steadily as it went. it was being immediately followed by 2 other objects which were only detectable because they had a single light on them. the lights they had were the same color as the triangle's and had the very same flicker. a minute or so after the second single light object went overhead a third single light object appeared from the same origin and followed the same exact path. it too had the same light and the same flicker. they moved so slowly that i took a cell phone picture of the triangle and shot a cell phone video of the event. after we lost sight of the objects over the atlantic ocean, my immediate group and the other people around us who had just watched the whole event began to discuss what had just happened.
content.summary: Triangle with lights at corners appeared followed by 3 single point of light objects that floated out to the ocean.

content.detailedDescription: I saw this too from milwaukee, wi. i was standing on my deck on june, 25th at approximately 9:15 pm and looking up to the east, north east and saw a flash of light, at first i thought it was a star, because the flash was so high in the sky, a little over half way up on the horizon, but it was much brighter than a star. the flash only lasted a couple of seconds and i watched as the light continued in a straight line across the sky from the flash spot to the south, but it was going away from me so it was like it was going to the south east too. the light continued in a straight line and continued to fade in brightness until it finally disappeared. this all happened in less than a minute, probably took 30-45 seconds. i did not look away from the object until i could not see it anymore. the light of the object just faded away like it went into outer space. the light did not pulsate or flash more than the intial flash, it just faded away like it went out of site. i live about seven miles from the milwaukee airport so i know what planes look like around here. they go directly over my house on takeoff and approach when using the north/south runways. there were multiple plains in the area at the time this happened so i was able to compare the light to them and it was nothing like a plane. it was way too high in the sky, and the flash and the speed that it disappeared were not how planes fly.
content.summary: I saw a flash of light that then disappeared in a straight line path into the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was camping near the river and looking at the stars at approximately 11:00 p.M. when i saw a bright light through the trees. at first i assumed it was a plane, as it moved in a perfectly straight path at a fast but not impossible speed. when it moved into an open patch of sky, i was able to see that there were four lights total, each in a different color, arranged in a large square pattern. the lights pulsated one at a time, but never went out completely. planes had passed over earlier that night, and differed from this object in that their lights were much dimmer, blinked on and off, and produced an easily audible sound. these objects however, produced absolutely no sound, which i can be certain of as the only other sound present that night was produced by my campfire. the object followed the course of the river until it moved out of my sight. as the objects passed in front of stars, the stars remained visible through the space between the objects, indicating that it was not one solid object. i vaguely recall all of the lights turning a yellowish color after they passed overhead, but i can not remember well enough to be certain this occured. as the objects passed by, several large waves came ashore in a way that resembled a boat's wake. this may have been unrelated, although there were no boats on the water at that time. i made an attempt to film the objects with a handheld digital video camera, but the camera was incapable of filming clearly at night.
content.summary: Four bright, multicolred lights flew over in a square formation soundlessly and without blocking stars.

content.detailedDescription: I was inside playing a video game while my wife and daughter were taking the dog out to potty. the told me to come outside and watch some fireworks that someone was shooting off. they went back outside while i stayed in playing my game. around 9:30pm they seen an orange glowing orb like object go from south to north. then 30 minutes later around 10:00pm they seen another orange object come over 71 highway from across the horizon coming from the west and going to the east. they told me that the object was glowing orange and was shaped like a jack like from a jacks game with a flame coming out of the top like an olympic torch. when they had told me what they have seen, i decided to go outside with them. i was outside about 30 - 40 minutes at 11:30pm and i could see the moon through some clouds coming in from the east. and sure enough, here comes this orange glowing orb like object coming over the highway out from the horizon coming from the west going to the east. this object was moving much faster than a plane. it looked to me just a little smaller then what the moon looked to the naked eye. very close, and it looked about the size of a private jet. maybe around 30-40ft. i watched it go across the sky and into the clouds over my house. and as it went into the clouds, i seen the orange glow fade out. when it faded out i got to see what it looked like. it was a round silver disc shaped object with a small round dark circle. and it had a half line on one side of the circle. we stayed outside for another hour but it was all over.
content.summary: 3 glowing objects flying across the sky.
Orange globes that flickered move one at time across the sky from west to east

content.detailedDescription: Standing outside in the early morning florida hours around 6:15am taking pictures of venus & jupiter, a very clear, big bright orb appeared in only one of the pictures.  i took several pictures before and after and this is only picture with the orb.  i did not see the orb when taking the picture.
content.summary: Orb in picture with venus & jupiter in florida morning sky

content.detailedDescription: I went outside on the small patio of my boyfriend's condo (2nd floor) to smoke and off about northeast (45 degrees from north to east) i spotted two objects that were brightly lit.  the glow was like an led light.  at first they were both red, one was a short distance from the other closer to the ground.  it look and appeared at first to be airplanes, but the color brightness/ depth was wrong.  noting that, i watched for a moment and the one closer to the ground started to change color from red to a violet-like color as it began to descend. the other was moving but staying in the general location i first saw it in.  both were slowly change color randomly from white to red to blue to green to a mixture of white and purple.  they were both changing color at the same time but not changing to the same color.  noticing that the one descending was making incredibly difficult turns and flashing colors i took my attention off of the other.  about a minute of watching the object it appeared to crash/land.  i felt sick like i had just witnessed an actual plane crash.  there was no sound of explosion, nothing.  curious i looked to see what the other object was up to and noticed it stayed in the sky and began moving about the sky making circles and other random maneuvers i had never seen any plane or helicopter make before.  it did this for 50 minutes or more and would disappear then reappear a short distance from it's previous location.  my boyfriend could see it moving around what looked like black objects.  after watching it disappear for the what i thought was the last time i grabbed my stuff and headed home (barely 1 mile south east of him) once home i walked to the end of the block just to make sure there wasn't anything in the sky and sure enough it was back.  i ran to grab my mom and when i returned to the same spot on the block it was gone.  now i just feel like a crazy person who shared a hallucination with my boyfriend.
content.summary: A glowing ball of light like a plane

content.detailedDescription: Me and two others where in our backyard talking at around 1 am and one of us, t (i will refer to us as a, s, and t for our first names to remain anonymous.) t pointed to a flashing white light in the sky and we have been watching it since. it has been moving in an undefined path but has been staying in the same general area of the sky. the flashes have been getting faster and slower off and on. it goes from 1 flash per five seconds to 3 flashes per second. it has been moving around getting faster and slower. it has been going on for going on an hour and a half and is still flashing as i type. t said she thought it was shaped like a triangle, and me and s really can't tell.
content.summary: Flashing white light that changed direction, speed of movement, and speed of flashes

content.detailedDescription: I was at work on my break and noticed other co-workers looking at something in the sky, it drew my attention. i then saw 15 red orbs circling each other across the horizon moving in an eastward direction while looking south in the sky. i was unsure of what the objects were as i have never seen anything like it before. the red orbs didn't flash or blink, it was solid red light, from the distance i was standing at they appeared to be approximately softball sized. the light was too big to be any normal aircraft and it was not fireworks based on  the fact that if it were fireworks they would travel vertically and then possibly drift a little and go out. these red orbs traveled quite a distance across the sky in a short period of time and as i said they were circling each other. it was too dark out and too great of a distance away to tell if it was one object with several lights or if they were separate objects circling each other, in all i counted 15 lights which in my opinion appeared to be separate objects. the 15 red orbs traveled out of our line of sight and disappeared. myself and my 3 other co-workers were shocked at what we were seeing, all of us were in awe and disbelief and ruled out every ordinary explanation....What we saw were 15 ufo's.
content.summary: Saw 15 red orbs while looking south, orbs were traveling east , circling each other .

content.detailedDescription:
June 9th 2012, long beach ca around 9:20pm. i heard helicopters flying over our house and looked out my window to see what was going on, i could see a red/orange pulsing orb and then i saw another one appear. i looked for helicopters and couldn't see any so i grabbed my phone (htc andriod) an i ran outside in my backyard. there were red orbs over my neighbors house pulsating turning a metallic white pink, yellow orange color and then red i starting taking photos and video i couldn't beileve it- the orbs were breaking off from each other and they would dissapear and then reappear.( i went in front of our house to get a bette shot/ video) i saw about 8 total but i couldn't get more then two in a shot ( i was trying to watch what was going on as i was filming so sorry for the shaky video.) at one point they would align into a straight line then dissapear they were moving fairly slow- i felt like it was almost a triangle at one point. after about 20 mins they disappeared. i saw a couple riding their bikes and asked them if they knew what they were and they were shocked and didn't know. 
i've been seeing white metallic orbs during the day off and on for a couple years there always high above the atmosphere they'll move sided to side and just hover in one spot- i remember taking a photo of one of them and a red orb appeared out of know where and almost flashed to make it self known- it def. scared me!!!!
content.summary: Red pulsing orbs long beach ca

content.detailedDescription: Bright red but small orb type light and randomly pulsating and then just disappeard over the western night skies
content.summary: Bright red but small orb type light and randomly pulsating and then just disappeard over the western night skies

content.detailedDescription: Hanging out in driveway with friends and family- mostly talking, someone pointed it out and we all took one look and quickly determined it was not a conventional craft --  eerie to say the least. we tracked it moving at a steady pace maybe 600' off the ground heading in the direction of the fireworks. 6-7 witnesses. viewed it thru my bushnell 4x30 binoculars. appeared to be a bright orange light with a flat bottom. flew from eat to west. eventually got behind trees and lost sight of it.
content.summary: Ball of light with flat bottom - bright orange

content.detailedDescription: We were traveling north from lansing ny towards auburn ny along a straight stretch of road. we were admiring the bright pink along the horizon, and i saw 5 bright star like objects in a perfect triangular formation. the sky was still quite bright above the horizon and i thought it strange to be able to see such bright stars. i slowed down to watch them as they appeared to be moving, i thought it may have been an optical illusion. 4 more objects came up from underneath and lined up along the bottom to close in the triangle, and i pulled over, asking my daughter, are they really moving? she replied yes, they are moving and moving fast. we watched them for about another minute, they looked to be traveling straight north, then veered ne and disappeared. the rest of the way home to syracuse i keep looking for stars and it wasn't until after 10 pm i saw any.  i just keep thinking, wow... it was such a perfect formation, and no blinking lights, steady just like stars. i just wish i had of grabbed my phone quicker to get a picture.
content.summary: Saw in the n saw a few bright starlike objects that appeared to be moving, more joined, counted 9 , they veered ne then vanished

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were riding and i spotted these lines in the sky.  so i took pictures. didn't motice anything unusual till we downloaded them and them the picture was larger than my cell phone screen and we think that you can see jets chasing something side by side   and more than one set chasing these things.
content.summary: We spotted acouple of sets of keys side by side chasing these things.    didn't notice tooich till i enlarged pictures. yoiu tell me what you see

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were sitting in the backyard when i looked up i saw the first of three lights from behind a tree when i pointed it out to my wife the were three red/orange pulsing lights in a triange silently moving in a line from northwest to southeast ad continued on that past until we could not see it any more
content.summary: Slow moving lights in the shape of a triangle

content.detailedDescription:
It wasn't there, then it was, maybe a mile or so away and maybe 1,000 feet up. two small yellow lights with a big red shimmering ball of red above and centered. kind of looked like it was on fire . it hovered for a minute or two, then went straight up for maybe a few hundred feet, stopped for a moment, then slowly moved away from me. it made no noise that i could hear. wind was variable and was faster than the object appeared to move. watched it head nne at a static altitude then after about 5 minutes the lights disappeared.
the yellow lights were solid and had definite outlines, perfectly round with no spots, the red orb in the center above shimmered.

i thought for a second it was one of those lanterns people launch, but it was clear it wasn't after it started to move. the movements were very straight and were going in a direction different than the prevailing winds. and it was too steady a path.
content.summary: Red shimmering orb, pulsating, rising streamers, yellow solid lights

content.detailedDescription: My brother and i were outside about ten pm and it was a warm evening, i remember planning on camping priorities to what we saw. we were facing north and noticed the direction of the next town over, a triangular object over the treeline. one by one, three lights turned on. then two more appeared and displayed the same light pattern.  i didn't hear it i couldn't hear crickets chirping.  they hovered there for a few minutes, then it was as if the lightswitch was turned off, for they just disappeared. this was in 1999. i just learned two years ago of a military base outside of astoria,  illinois and i have been close enough to see things dropped into it from airplanes. i've lived here all my life and never knew of this just until recently.  that summer sevral sightings were reported and even the local judge wrote something about it in the paper.I just guessing a month and day
content.summary: Triangular craft lights appeared one by one then  two more observed  doin same thre ligt total  then blinked out.

content.detailedDescription:
The video for:
case number	39964
log number	us-06302012-0026
date submitted	 06/30/2012 10:27 utc
date of the event	 06/30/2012 09:53 utc

troy mi
content.summary: Short video of lights in sky troy mi

content.detailedDescription: while outside smoking a cigarette my girlfriend pointed out what looked like a fast moving fireball traveling northeast. we followed it and it seemingly "burned out" and disappeared. not even a minute later, another fireball came from the same area as the first again burning out where the first one had. this occurred again two more times, all originating from the same spot and burning out in the same  vicinity. this occurred over the span of approximately 7 - 10 minutes. we had no idea what the object and could not think of a reasonable explanation for what we were seeing.
content.summary: Looked on fire!!!

content.detailedDescription: Vi una luz brillante como una estrella grande y despues rapidamente se hizo peque���a, y empeso a a dirigirce asi otra luz que se movio de la misma manera, aproximadamente 3 minutos despues volvio a pasar de manera mas grande dejando  una estela de luz muy parecido a un cometa.
content.summary: Objetos luminosos voladores

content.detailedDescription:
This was grate i video a ufo from the back yard again as i was videoing the moon i notice something going through the big dipper area going south east it was higher than a typical airplanes but low enoff to see after about 5 min. of videoing the ufo...Then off to the west by the moon here comes 4 flashing lights in a formation going some what south east. then they started to brake away from each other looking for something as they flu around the monterey bay area for another 10 min.
the next night i video the same area and another ufo came from the south very fast going north west this was around 9 pm.
content.summary: Ufo going across the big dipper going south east  then 4 helicopters? looking around the monterey bay

content.detailedDescription: I was driving north on john r rd in troy with my husband at approximately 9:52 pm on june 30th 2012, approaching the maple rd intersection when we both noticed a "train" of lights traveling slowly and quietly just ahead moving east. there were trees in the skyline but more kept entering our line of vision over the road, over 2 dozen softly pulsating lights coming from the west. we pulled over .25 miles up the road and i got out of the car. i tried to count the lights, there were maybe 27-30 of them but they were fading as they headed east. it was hard for me to tell how low they were but i could not make out any distinct characteristics of the objects except that they looked like low moving stars traveling in a clustered line, no sound at all. i took a quick video on my phone but the image quality is poor and most had already passed.
content.summary: Over two dozen silently pulsating lights seen in troy sky heading east

content.detailedDescription: I was playing my xbox while talking on the headset to my neighborhood who lives across the back yard from me. he exclaimed "hurry, look out your back window, there's something crazy in the sky". when i ran outside, a red orb was floating over some houses in my neighborhood while heading over the treeline near the woods. several neighbors witnessed the object, and were walking around their houses to watch it. the object made no noise as it flew. as it was some distance over the treeline, it stopped and hovered for a few moments, before turning to the right, and ascending. as it ascended, i lost sight of it due to a tree that is close by in my back yard. it was like nothing else i have seen before. when it was close to me, and i could see it in detail, there was no body to the object; it consisted entirely of a glowing red orb. overall, many people in my neighborhood witnessed it, and they all seemed to agree that it was definitely not any sort of conventional aircraft.
content.summary: Red orb flies over neighborhood

content.detailedDescription: Daughter was standing outside garage and yelled for me to come look at what she was seeing i came out of garage and witnessed two glowing orbs flying straight path from south heading north as i walked futher out witnessed two to three more glowing slow moving orbs following along the same path followed by a couple more they appeared to have a glowing aura surrounding them almost like the outline of a parachute or jellyfish we watched as they all passed by and disappeared into the haze they made no sound and several people in the neighborhood witnessed the orbs
content.summary: Glowing orbs came from n to s
